root.name: Colour Bind
root.description: OverviewA puzzle-platformer game where the player must manipulate objects; the gimmick is that gravity is not determined by an object's mass, instead it is determined but the colour. The game tasks the player with navigating through more than 50 puzzles; the game also features local co-op.The game was released on September 24, 2012 for PC and Mac; a Linux version is slated for release in the future.PC System RequirementsMinimumOS: Microsoft® Windows® XPProcessor: 1.4GHz or fasterMemory: 768 MB RAMGraphics: Pixel Shader 2.0DirectX®: 9.0cHard Drive: 50 MB HD space
